CustomField.description: The number of seconds that have been spent talking on internal calls which have been established from one user to another within the organisation, from the perspective of the To party. Specifically this statistic only includes calls where the user was the first to pick up a call and doesn't include any subsequent dialogues/ calls where the user had a call transferred to them.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: How many seconds of talk time have I spent on calls that I received from other internal users in my organisation, where the call was not transferred
CustomField.label: Internal To Talk Seconds as Primary
